name: Kitty Kebab
description:
Help the greatest cat chef, Siaty, serve up meals by skewering and platforming your way to victory!

**This game is a submission for the GMTK Jam 2021**

Shooting a stick and skewering the food will Join them Together and create a platform you can use. A little bit of timing, precision, and knowing just where to skewer them is your key to victory. The goal is to reach the end of the level, marked by the word "SERVE!"

In terms of the jam's theme, "Joined Together," this game plays into it conceptually as kebab is a food joined together by being skewed by a stick. Mechanically, the stick and the food join with one another to create a dynamic platform for the player to use.

Have fun~!
